company.description: The company who owns the information in the file

person.description: The person responsible for the information in the file

editor_software.description: The software that has generated the file

created.description: The timestamp of the creation of the file, in RFC 3339 date-time format

updated.description: The timestamp of the last update of the file, in RFC 3339 date-time format

project.description: The name of the project included in the file

version.description: The name of the project included in the file

items.description: Colors can be defined by hex, rgb, cmyk or name. Name of the color present here can be references in the other elements
